"Hello, hello, Patty here!": "I feel like I've introduced myself like this before."
"I really don't think anyone cares. Tea here."
"That aside, we managed to investigate that thing you were curious about!"
"You don't remember, uh \"that\"!? That super dangerous thingy-ma-thing!"
"Right! The Genesis rod, the Ivory Staff Clarissa!"
"You were curious about it, right? Well, doesn't matter, we looked into it anyway!"
"It has a beautiful snow-white frame that shines when you touch it. Wait, was it white?"
"Isn't that what we went to investigate in the first place? I'll take it from here, Patty."
"According to our sources, it seems that Clarissa was lost ten years ago."
"That's why the weapon the current Claris Claes is carrying is a fake."
"Even though it's not the original, it still has immense power. Not something you'd want to be on the receiving end of."
"Even among the Genesis weapons, Clarissa is special. It's said that it chooses someone with the right level of ability to wield it..."
"The rod chooses who's able to use it? It's almost like it's alive. That would explain why she talks to it!"
"You're right, it's not uncommon to hear rumors of Claris Claes talking to her weapon."
"\"Give me power, more power, did you hear me?\", something like that?"
"Why did you make her sound so condescending?"
